FOOTER.TAGLINE: We bring you the future of computing with innovative AI and IoT solutions that drive the global economy towards a safer, more sustainable horizon.

HOME.HERO_BADGE: EDGE AI FOR SMART & SAFE MOBILITY
HOME.HERO_PARAGRAPH: Our intelligent AI camera combines Driver Monitoring System (DMS) and Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS) to detect risks in real time and enhance road safety for drivers and pedestrians.
HOME.SECTOR_SUBTITLE: A single AI Dashcam system, engineered for the unique demands of every transport sector.
HOME.LOGISTICS_DESC: Videotelematics optimizes routes and fuel consumption while providing delivery proof. It reduces accidents and supports driver coaching with real-time footage.
HOME.OIL_GAS_DESC: Videotelematics enhances safety for hazardous material transport and helps meet regulatory compliance. It provides evidence for incidents and supports driver behavior monitoring.
HOME.TAXI_DESC: Videotelematics protects drivers and passengers with in-cab recording and supports dispute resolution. It helps optimize trips and monitor driver performance.
HOME.SCHOOL_BUS_DESC: Videotelematics ensures child safety with cabin and exterior monitoring and creates a reliable audit trail. It helps manage driver behavior and respond to incidents.
HOME.PUBLIC_BUS_DESC: Videotelematics improves passenger safety and documents incidents in public transport. It helps optimize operations and maintain service quality.
HOME.SERVICES_SUBTITLE: High-performance engineering for the next generation of business computing.
HOME.IOT_INTEGRATION_DESC: Seamlessly connecting your hardware ecosystem with intelligent cloud infrastructures.
HOME.HARDWARE_DESIGN_DESC: From schematic to PCB layout, we build the physical foundations of your technical strategy.
HOME.SOFTWARE_DESIGN_DESC: Custom enterprise applications and firmware optimized for performance and AI.
HOME.IOT_ACCELERATION_DESC: Speed up your time-to-market with our pre-built frameworks and rapid deployment tools.
HOME.ACCENTIFY_PLATFORM_DESC: Our flagship orchestration platform for real-time fleet management and asset monitoring.
HOME.PROTOTYPING_DESC: Transforming complex ideas into functional physical prototypes for testing and validation.
HOME.LOCAL_EDGE_DESC: Our dashcam runs a powerful Neural Processing Unit (NPU) locally. It analyzes 30 frames per second to detect risks in under 100 milliseconds—faster than a human blink.
HOME.OTA_EVOLUTION_DESC: Through Over-the-Air (OTA) updates, your fleet hardware stays modern. New AI detection models are pushed remotely, ensuring your investment improves over time.
HOME.SENSOR_FUSION_DESC: Merging high-fidelity Sony Starvis visual data with GPS, G-Sensor, and 4G telemetry to create a 360-degree digital twin of every critical event.
HOME.INNOVATION_QUOTE: We don't just record video; we understand the environment. Our innovation lies in the synergy between proprietary AI algorithms and industrial-grade hardware.
HOME.ECOSYSTEM_PARAGRAPH: With over 40,000 active devices deployed across 15 countries, ACCENT manages one of the most robust industrial IoT infrastructures in the region.
HOME.HARDWARE_MASTERY_DESC: Proprietary PCB design and firmware optimization for high-uptime environments.
HOME.LTE_V2X_DESC: Seamless 4G/LTE, 5G-ready, and V2X communication for ultra-low latency alerts.
HOME.CLOUD_ORCHESTRATION_DESC: Centralized VSS/FMS platforms handling millions of data points every hour.
HOME.RELIABILITY_ZERO_DESC: Engineered for 96.5% uptime in industrial transport applications.
HOME.VALUES_QUOTE: At Accent, we foster a Culture of Discovery, propelling the tech sector forward with a creative strategy to meet your business goals. Socially responsible, we actively envision solutions for environment safety, energy optimization and carbon footprint reduction.
HOME.SAFETY_SLIDE_1_TEXT: AI detects risky situations in real time, helping prevent accidents before they happen.
HOME.SAFETY_SLIDE_2_TEXT: Critical events are automatically recorded in high definition, providing reliable evidence when you need it.
HOME.SAFETY_SLIDE_3_TEXT: Sensitive data is processed securely, so drivers and passengers stay protected without compromising privacy.
HOME.SAFETY_SLIDE_4_TEXT: Smart alerts and continuous monitoring keep every vehicle under watch, day and night, in all conditions.

ABOUT_US.INTRO: ACCENT is a Tunisian tech firm established in 2018, operating at the forefront of the IOT sector. We specialize in crafting and developing connected devices tailored for safety and monitoring, offering dependable data for innovators keen on optimizing resource performance through precise solutions.
ABOUT_US.VISION_TITLE: We envision a vibrant economy and a better society
ABOUT_US.VISION_P1: Our vision is rooted in being a thriving business trusted by our stakeholders for the accuracy of our data. We are driven to elevate the technology sector by constantly innovating, creating, and exploring new models of growth.
ABOUT_US.VISION_P2: We envision a vibrant economy and a better society shaped by our commitment to driving innovation in the technology sector.
ABOUT_US.MISSION_TITLE: Facilitating with Optimal Assets, Innovating for Security
ABOUT_US.MISSION_P: We facilitate effective asset optimisation and provide decision-makers and individuals with a wide range of services and applications to improve and secure the environment.
ABOUT_US.VALUES_QUOTE: At Accent, we foster a Culture of Discovery, propelling the tech sector forward with a creative strategy to meet your business goals. Socially responsible, we actively envision solutions for environment safety, energy optimization and carbon footprint reduction.

SERVICES.INTRO: Drawing upon expertise across multiple domains, Accent has crafted solutions that piece together its rich history. These components seamlessly integrate into various applications through our flexibility.

SOLUTIONS.SUBTITLE: Tailored AI Monitoring for every transport application.
SOLUTIONS.AI_DASHCAM_DESC: An advanced dashcam solution combining AI, real-time alerts, GPS tracking, and night vision to ensure smarter, safer driving. Ideal for accident prevention, driver monitoring, and fleet management.
SOLUTIONS.LOGISTICS_DESC: In long-haul freight, our AI Dashcam monitors driver fatigue during extended shifts, detects lane drifting instantly, and provides evidence for high-value cargo protection.
SOLUTIONS.OIL_GAS_DESC: Transporting volatile materials requires extreme compliance. Our industrial-grade hardware operates in temperatures from -20°C to +70°C and uses tamper-proof storage.
SOLUTIONS.TAXI_DESC: Dual-lens monitoring protects drivers and passengers. High-definition cabin analysis records interactions, providing crucial evidence and professional standards.

PARTNER.HERO_SUBTITLE: Collaboration proposal to integrate our camera on your platform and quickly evolve to video telematics.
PARTNER.COLLABORATION_DESC: Integrate our AI Dashcam camera on your existing platform and transform your offering in just weeks. We provide free support on video integration to achieve optimal time-to-market.
PARTNER.EVOLUTION_DESC: Transform from simple geolocation or basic tracking to a complete video telematics solution in just one month. Our free technical support enables you to quickly integrate video features on your platform.
PARTNER.BENEFIT_1_DESC: Free support on video integration for fast and efficient deployment on your platform.
PARTNER.BENEFIT_2_DESC: Accelerate your market entry with our dedicated technical support and integration tools.
PARTNER.BENEFIT_3_DESC: Transform your geolocation offering into a complete video telematics solution in just one month.
PARTNER.INTEGRATION_DESC: Our AI Dashcam camera easily integrates with your existing infrastructure via our APIs and SDKs. We provide free technical support to help you integrate video features quickly.
PARTNER.SUPPORT_DESC: Benefit from our video integration expertise with dedicated technical support. We help you implement video features on your platform for optimal time-to-market.
PARTNER.TRANSFORMATION_DESC: Evolve your business in one month: transform from a simple geolocation or tracking solution to a complete video telematics platform with real-time video, AI alerts, and behavioral analysis.
